description: Elevate your grooming routine with The Man Company! Discover exceptional deals and discounts on premium men’s grooming products. Enjoy incredible discounts and maximize your savings with our The Man Company discount coupons!

posts.post_content:
Being a gentleman ourselves we know what a real gentleman deserves and this combo has everything to fulfil all your grooming needs in every way possible.
What's in the Combo
   1. Body Lotion - Oats & Wheat Germ ExtractThe Man Company’s Body Lotion is a naturally rich blend of Oats & Wheat Germ Extract to lend your skin long-lasting moisture and care. The subtle fragrance that lingers is what makes this skin treat feel like a dream. Despite being super hydrating, the body lotion gets absorbed quickly without making your skin feel sticky or oily. Colloidal Oatmeal moisturises your skin for up to 24 hours and adds a gentle touch of radiance, relieving it from dryness and dullness.
   2. Moisturising Cream | Shea Butter And Vitamin EThe moisturising cream is much more than an optional skin care product these days, it is a necessity. Adding a moisturiser to your regime is a blessing because it pampers your skin and ensures that it is properly hydrated all throughout the day. The inclusion of Shea Butter signifies that it will effectively keep your skin soft and supple. Whereas Vitamin E helps the skin in recovering from scars that normally take time to heal.
   3. Essencia Lip balmThe weather and environment taking a toll on your lips? Bring home the gentle, revitalizing treatment of this lip balm. With Almond Oil and Vitamin E, this lip balm nourishes your lips while healing and protecting them against sun damage which makes it an irreplaceable part of face care for men. It can be your little promise to your lips to always keep them healthy.
   4. Body Wash - Patchouli & Sea SaltThe Man Company’s Patchouli & Sea Salt Body Wash is what you need in your life. The body wash is formulated with the goodness of natural ingredients and is SLS & paraben-free, making your bathing experience feel like a dip in the ocean.

What's in the Combo 
De-Tan Face Wash: The Man Company’s De-Tan Face Wash allows the goodness of Turmeric and Moringa wrapped in Walnut Beads to gently exfoliate your skin and wash away tan, one day at a time. As a powerful and anti-inflammatory ingredient, Turmeric speeds up the de-tanning process and revives your skin by bringing out its natural glow. Rich in Vitamin C, Moringa evens out skin tone, hydrates and prevents dryness. Every time you wash your face, all you get is bright and rejuvenated skin.
De-Tan Face Gel: Regular exposure to the sun can cause your skin to tan, and we’re here to ban it. A suntan can make your skin dull and dry, but not anymore. The Man Company’s De-Tan Face Gel is specially formulated with natural ingredients like Aloe Vera and Turmeric to deliver a brightening and hydrating boost. Also known as a natural moisturiser, Aloe Vera has cooling and anti-inflammatory properties and hydrates the skin without making it greasy. Known for its magic since ancient times, Turmeric tackles dullness and adds an even glow. Now is your time to gel up with brighter and youthful-looking skin without worrying about tanning.
De-Tan Body Wash: We’ve got you just the solution to wash away tan with every shower. The Man Company’s De-Tan Body Wash has the goodness of Saffron and Turmeric that naturally exfoliates and brightens your body. The body wash has Walnut Beads to ensure a gentle yet deep cleansing experience. Anciently known to brighten & cleanse the skin, Saffron reduces pigmentation and sunburns, giving you an even skin tone. Turmeric fades away the dullness caused by tanning and delivers the glow your skin deserves. The body wash does not strip your skin of its natural moisture and ensures an itch-free & hydrated look. With every single shower, get the confidence to head out in the sun to have all the more fun.

Charcoal Face Wash - One of the most annoying things about the dirt and oil is that they settle down in the skin pores and thus, cannot be removed with a normal wash. The dirt and excess oil then go on to breed the bacteria that results into pimples. Hence, it is recommended to use charcoal face wash for oily skin, which would get rid of the clogged skin pores.

It is made to suit all skin types and is complete with anti-oxidising agents that help fight dullness caused by tanning. An easy to blend texture for you to put before stepping out and enjoying the sun!

Beard Growth Pair details:
Put your Beard troubles to an end for once and for all!
What’s In the Combo?


Derma Roller: Activate your scalp with The Man Company’s incredibly safe to use and effective Derma Roller. A newly-introduced hand-held device specially designed with a titanium finish for superior handling. It has 540 (0.5 mm) chromium needles that create micro-punctures on the surface of your scalp to bring sleeping follicles back to life. The micro-needles penetrate just deep enough to boost growth and increase blood circulation and supply of collagen, efficiently improving hair health. We recommend using the Derma Roller twice weekly, and make sure you clean it at regular intervals using rubbing alcohol or hot water for 5 minutes and dry it properly for longevity and hygiene.


Beard Oil - Almond & Thyme: Beard oil is one of the most important products for any man who wants to flaunt a bearded look. In fact, they are good enough to promote beard growth further by supplying all the necessary nutrients. A beard oil for men that has the properties and benefits of Almond and Thyme is best known to promote growth besides making it more manageable and amazing. Hence, apart from being a grooming and beard styling requirement, it is also one of the most important beard growth products.


Using these innovative products together is sure to work its magic on your Beard leaving you with the Beard of your dreams.
How to follow Beard Growth Regime:


Step 1: Hold the roller firmly yet gently in your hand.



Step 2: Now, with little pressure, roll it horizontally, vertically & diagonally on your beard.



Step 3: Take a few drops of the beard oil on your palm.



Step 4: Rub your palms together and massage on your beard until completely absorbed.



Quick Tip:
For best results, wash your hair thoroughly using The Man Company’s Biotin Shampoo. Ensure that your hair is squeaky clean & dry before using the derma roller. Discard the Derma Roller once the needles become blunt.
FAQ’s
Q: Will it make my beard soft?
A: Yes, the Caffeine Beard Oil will nourish your beard and add a natural shine to it, making it more hydrated and softer.
Q: Will this relieve patchiness?
A: Yes, the tool is an effective solution to treat patchy zones on your scalp and beard regions. Make sure you use it regularly, but gently.
Q: Will it prick my scalp & skin?
A: Yes, the needles present on the roller will prick you a little, but it is a good prick that boosts hair growth. But do not forget to be gentle!
Q: How many times can I use it in a week?
A: The product is safe to use twice weekly.
Q: Will it harm my hair?
A: No, it won’t harm your hair. On the contrary, it helps deal with slower hair growth and patchiness.

How to use EDP Pride:

Step 2: Neck region

Step 3: Both wrists

Eau de Parfum | Firewood (30 ml) Details:
Add wood to your fierce virtue, the fiery aura of your personality, and make a mark on everything ashen with your brilliance. As you do it all, let Firewood be your promised accompaniment.
Carefully crafted to establish and enhance your unmatched persona, we present to you an opportunity to do it in style. A permanent example of warmth reflective of your warm and gentle nature, Firewood exudes the essence of woody warmth coupled with subtleties of earthy sweetness.
Firewood is a profound mystery described by the aromatic essence of warm, earthy, and spicy notes. It displays a gentle hint of creamy sweetness and warm delight. Its top notes exhibit a blend of warm, spicy-sweet, earthy, rich profiles of Nutmeg blended with Bergamot and Geranium. The settling essence of Cedarwood, Patchouli, and Sandalwood follow with their earthy, woody, warm, exotic and uplifting essence. The last and the lasting are the base notes of White and Pink Musk coupled with Vetiver leaving you and your world smelling like the sensual, earthy, leathery, smoky, and rosy feels of a forest evening spent by the fire.
To all the ashen days of utter pallor, add Firewood to your life. It sets the world ablaze with the following notes:
Top: Nutmeg, Bergamot, Geranium
Middle: Cedarwood, Patchouli, Sandalwood
Base: White and Pink Musk, Vetiver
Usage: Be the fire of your days with Firewood’s lasting essence every day.
Quick tip- Don't rub your wrists together after spraying the perfume, as it may kill the notes and alter the fragrance. Instead, spray it on the pulse points and just lightly dab it.



HOW TO USE?


Step 1: Spray the perfume directly on pulse points. It includes area behind the ears


Step 2: Neck region

For best results-Apply the perfume over a moisturiser to make the fragrance last longer.
Precautions
This perfume would evaporate if you don’t store it well. Hence, you need to store it in a cool and dry place, preferably in the original box it comes in.
Also, if you are spraying it on the skin, do not use it on cuts or nicks, and the same goes for the eyes as well.
FAQ's
Does this fragrance stay for longer?
Absolutely! Firewood has warm and woody notes that are meant to last on your skin for a long time. Additionally, it will also set the world around you ablaze. 
Is this a deo or a perfume?
Firewood is a perfume for men just like any of your favourite colognes. It is not a deo because it is absolutely free of any gas content. 
Which personality does this fragrance fit?
Firewood is a refined and rich fragrance that has been created for a man who has a strong aura and is all set to take over the world. 
I sweat a lot. Will this work for me?
Yes, Firewood is a fragrance that will keep you smelling fresh throughout the day even if you sweat a lot. You can always spray the product after a few hours to keep the body odour away.
Will this fragrance fetch me compliments?
Yes, it will. Every single time you apply Firewood make sure you’ve got enough room in your heart to fetch compliments from everybody around you.

What’s In the Combo?


 Intense EDP Details 



We’ve taken our time to revel in a range of natural ingredients and formulate our Eau De Parfum Intense. An Oriental fragrance with unmatched warm and musky top notes blended beautifully with lavender’s exotic sweetness and lemon’s citrusy freshness. It holds to its core a distinct spicy-sweet blend of patchouli, coffee accord, and plum. What lasts and reverberates, in the end, is a subtle base note of rich and woody amber wood perfected with a sweet and sultry touch of vanilla.
Fragrance Notes:
Top Note: Oriental
A fragrance that opens with an oriental note is supposed to freshen up your mind, body and soul.
Middle Note: Patchouli
Due to its presence in the heart note patchouli adds to your scent an earthy and herbaceous vibe.
Base Note: Vanilla
Vanilla’s reputation as a powerful aphrodisiac endures, and it’s often present in alluring fragrances.
     2. EDP Musk Details
As an accompaniment to the lasting essence of a gentleman who carries his warmth and style as his second skin, we announce Musk. Dressed in lemon, basil leaf, eucalyptus and lavandin, the top blend announces your essence with a fresh citrusy charm. The middle notes follow your footsteps with a spicy tone of marine, cedarwood and peppermint, leaving a pleasant scent wafting about you. Finally the lasting bit of musk stands true to its name and goes about exuding a musky aroma topped with an intoxicating touch of vanilla.
Fragrance Notes:
Top Note: Lemon
Lemon makes for a sparkling top note that is zesty and cheerful to keep your spirit high and uplifted.
Middle Note: Marine
If your fragrance has notes of marine, it means that it beautifully captures the essence of fresh sea air and the shore at its heart.
Base Note: Musk
As a base note, musk is known to linger onto you even after the aromatic transition of your fragrance.
    3. EDP Oud Details
Oud is a carefully crafted scent for the gentleman who flows by his days exuding an aura of perfection.
Our EDP Oud is a mystery blend of essential oils. It is decorated with top notes of fresh citruses and whisky. It settles for you with the earthy notes of coriander, creating a suave balance along with the spiciness of cinnamon and pepper. The resting and relaxing base notes of Oud are woody with a sweet powdery warmth that exhibits sweet and spicy qualities of patchouli befriending the exotic essence of vanilla.
Top Note: Whisky
Fragrances laced with a complex note like whisky are known to be very warm, sophisticated and deep.
Middle Note: Coriander
Coriander when put in the heart note of your fragrance ensures a suave and spicy character while making sure it does not overpower your senses. 
Base Note: Patchouli
As an ingredient, patchouli is known to act as an excellent fixative that extends the life of your perfume.

Beard Booster Duo details:
Want a solution that puts beard patchiness to an end and efficiently improves growth?
We’ve got just the duo for you.


Derma Roller: Activate your beard with The Man Company’s incredibly safe to use and effective Derma Roller. A newly-introduced hand-held device specially designed with a titanium finish for superior handling. It has 540 (0.5 mm) chromium needles that create micro-punctures on your face to bring sleeping hair follicles back to life. The micro-needles penetrate just deep enough to increase blood circulation and supply of collagen, efficiently improving the growth of the beard. We recommend using the Derma Roller twice weekly, and make sure you clean it at regular intervals using rubbing alcohol or warm water for 5 minutes and dry it properly for longevity and hygiene.


Caffeine Beard Growth Serum: The Man Company’s Caffeine Beard Growth Serum is a rich blend of Coffee Arabica & Biotin that nourishes your bread and accelerates its growth. Biotin is a magic ingredient known to enhance the thickness of your beard. It also fixes frizziness by providing deep nourishment and hydration. Not just that, the serum also activates the hair follicles and keeps patchiness in check. Regular application ensures that you achieve the beard you’ve always dreamt of. We recommend using it twice daily.


Together the duo works its magic to give you a beard that will make you stand out of the crowd.



How to use Beard Booster Duo:


Step 1: Hold the roller firmly yet gently in your hand.


Step 2: Now, with little pressure, roll it horizontally, vertically & diagonally on your beard.


Step 3: Take a few drops of the beard growth serum on your palm


Step 4: Rub your palms together and massage on your beard until completely absorbed.




Quick Tip:
For best results, wash your beard thoroughly using The Man Company’s Almond & Thyme Beard Wash. Ensure that your beard is squeaky clean & dry before using the derma roller. Discard the Derma Roller once the needles become blunt.
FAQ’s
Q: Will these products help with patchiness?
A: Yes, the Beard Booster duo effectively helps deal with patchiness and ensure a fuller and thicker beard.
Q: Will it make my beard soft?
A: Yes, the Caffeine Beard Growth Serum will nourish your beard and add a natural shine to it, making it more hydrated and softer.
Q: Will the roller prick my skin?
A: Yes, the micro-needles present on the roller will prick you a little, but it is a good prick that boosts beard growth. But do not forget to be gentle!
Q: How many times in a week can I use the Derma Roller?
A: You can use the Derma Roller twice a week.
Q: How often do I need to clean the Derma Roller?
A: It is advisable to clean the derma roller on regularly, especially after use. Clean it with warm water or rubbing alcohol for 5 minutes and dry off completely.

Our skin deserves a detox ride from everyday pollution! We have just the perfect one for you!
The Man Company’s Charcoal Body Wash is infused with Activated Charcoal and Lemongrass to deeply detoxify, cleanse and exfoliate your skin with every shower. Not just that, it also has Cinnamon essential oil that helps soothe dry and itchy skin.
Charcoal is a tried and tested cleansing agent known for its unique ability to draw out toxins induced by pollution and purify you from skin to soul. Lemongrass lends a refreshing touch, leaving your body squeaky clean.
Every time you step in for a shower, you witness all the dirt, dust, and grime get off your body. Our body wash gently cleanses your body without ripping off its natural moisture, keeping it far from rashes and dryness.
Benefits of Charcoal Body Wash



Detoxes & refreshes: Allow the power of activated charcoal and refreshment of lemongrass to deeply detox and exfoliate your skin with each shower. Our body wash gently removes all pollution-induced toxins, dirt and oil from the pores of your skin.


Prevents rashes: If you have skin that gets rashes, Charcoal Body Wash is here for the rescue. It deeply cleanses your skin without stripping off its natural moisture. Activated charcoal also helps tighten your skin over time.


Infused with charcoal & lemongrass: The Man Company’s Charcoal Body Wash is infused with activated charcoal and refreshing lemongrass to deliver the best bathing experience your body has ever witnessed. Activated charcoal exfoliates and deeply detoxifies your skin, and lemongrass refreshes and cleanses it.



 



HOW TO USE?


Step 1: Wet your body


Step 2: Pour some body wash on your loofah


Step 3: Gently rub the loofah against your skin to form a lather


Step 4: Rinse it off thoroughly and pat dry using a towel

Beard Electric Trimmer & EDT Black Details: 
If you are a gentleman who wishes to fall in love every time you steal a glance of your beard in the mirror, this trimmer is for you.
The Man Company’s Electric Beard Trimmer comes with 4 comb attachments to give you just the bearded look you desire every single time. Its ergonomic and chic design ensures a solid grip and comfort while you trim your mane. The stainless-steel blade and comfortable head ensure a precisely-clean and close trim.
The trimmer comes with a USB charging cable to keep your beard game on the go no matter where you are. One round of battery charging delivers a 30-minute operation time, and the cordless feature adds up to the convenience. You can even use it to trim your moustache and sideburns.
Trust us when we say this is everything a beard lover looks for in a trimmer.
How to use Beard Trimmer Electric:


Step 1: Gently press the comb attachment onto the blade until it clicks


Step 2: Press the ON/OFF button to switch on the trimmer


Step 3: Move the trimmer against your hair growth


Step 4: Remove the comb and clean the trimmer after use


For best results, ensure that the trimming comb is in full contact with the skin beneath your beard.
Quick Tip:
Post trimming your hair, rinse your beard with The Man Company Almond & Thyme Beard Wash and top it up with Almond & Thyme Beard Wax.
Benefits of Beard Trimmer Electric:


Self-sharpening stainless-steel blade: The Electric Beard Trimmer comes with a high-quality self-sharpening stainless-steel blade that ensures that you get a close trim every time you use it. It also has 4 comb attachments that give you just the bearded look that you desire. You can use it to trim your beard, moustache and sideburns.


30-minute operation time: The Man Company’s Electric Beard Trimmer supports USB charging, and one round promises an operation time of 30 minutes. It is portable and easy to carry, ensuring that your grooming game continues no matter where you go. The cordless feature also adds up to your convenience.


Ergonomic design for solid grip & comfort: The trimmer’s ergonomic and chic design ensures a solid grip and comfort when you trim. It is sturdy to lend a good grip, making your trimming experience comfortable.



FAQs:
Q: Is there a warranty period for this product?
A: Yes, the electric beard trimmer has a warranty period of 1 year.
Q: Can it be used cordless?
A: Yes, you can use the trimmer cordless for 30 minutes.
Q: Is it for long or short beards?
A: The electric beard trimmer is perfect for all kinds of beards. You get 4 comb attachments to suit your beard length.
Q: Can I use it to trim my moustache and sideburns?
A: Yes. Apart from your beard, you can use the beard trimmer to trim your sideburns and moustache too.
Q: Does the trimmer has a good battery life?
A: Yes, the electric beard trimmer delivers 30 minutes of operation time on charging once.

Eau De Toilette Triumph Details:
We'll put you in the spirit to seize all your day outings.
Triumph is an earthy & warm masculine scent that is invigorating and energising. The top note of Bergamot gives it a bright and uplifting aroma and fills you with confidence and optimism. At the same time, the heart note of Amberwood adds a touch of spice and warmth that makes you feel like you can conquer anything. Finally, the base note of Patchouli gives it an earthy scent that makes it a perfect fit for when you are out and about during the day.
How To Use Eau De Toilette Triumph:
Step 1: Spray the perfume directly on pulse points. It includes the area behind your ears
Step 2: Neck region
Step 3: Both wrists 
Quick Tip: Rubbing your wrists together can kill the notes, altering the fragrance. Instead, spray it on the pulse points and lightly dab it.
Benefits of Eau De Toilette Triumph:
Long-Lasting Freshness: The intoxicating concoction of earthy and warm notes provides long-lasting freshness. It is a perfect choice for those who love going out and making the most of their day. 
Boosts Confidence: Confidence is a must for the gentleman who loves victories, and our perfume helps you feel more relaxed and confident. Each spritz allows you to take on challenges with a positive attitude.
Makes You Stand Out: The rich blend of Bergamot, Amberwood and Patchouli creates a warm and inviting aroma that is sure to draw compliments and prepares you to create an impact with every spritz.

Beard Growth Regime details:
Put your Beard troubles to an end for once and for all!
What’s In the Combo?


Derma Roller: Activate your scalp with The Man Company’s incredibly safe to use and effective Derma Roller. A newly-introduced hand-held device specially designed with a titanium finish for superior handling. It has 540 (0.5 mm) chromium needles that create micro-punctures on the surface of your scalp to bring sleeping follicles back to life. The micro-needles penetrate just deep enough to boost growth and increase blood circulation and supply of collagen, efficiently improving hair health. We recommend using the Derma Roller twice weekly, and make sure you clean it at regular intervals using rubbing alcohol or hot water for 5 minutes and dry it properly for longevity and hygiene.


Beard Wash - Almond & Thyme: Absolutely clean from root to tip but still soft and well-conditioned? You read that right! The Almond and Thyme Beard Wash is the regular cleansing essential you need to maintain a healthy and hygienic beard. This beard shampoo will clear the grime and build-up without causing damage, in fact conditions your beard and has easy beard styling potential. Almond Oil and Thyme promote thick, strong and shiny beard growth, while their calming, earthy scents have a relaxing effect on your body.



Beard Oil - Almond & Thyme: Beard oil is one of the most important products for any man who wants to flaunt a bearded look. In fact, they are good enough to promote beard growth further by supplying all the necessary nutrients. A beard oil for men that has the properties and benefits of Almond and Thyme is best known to promote growth besides making it more manageable and amazing. Hence, apart from being a grooming and beard styling requirement, it is also one of the most important beard growth products.


Using these three innovative products together is sure to work its magic on your Beard leaving you with the Beard of your dreams.
How to follow Beard Growth Regime:


Step 1: Hold the roller firmly yet gently in your hand.


Step 2: Now, with little pressure, roll it horizontally, vertically & diagonally on your beard.


Step 3: Take a few drops of the beard oil on your palm and massage on your beard


Step 4: After its absorbed, use the Beard wash to clean it.


Quick Tip:
For best results, wash your hair thoroughly using The Man Company’s Charcoal Shampoo. Ensure that your hair is squeaky clean & dry before using the derma roller. Discard the Derma Roller once the needles become blunt.
FAQ’s
Q: Will this product help with hair fall?
A: No, the Derma Roller majorly focuses on increasing hair growth in both your scalp and beard regions.
Q: Will this relieve patchiness?
A: Yes, the tool is an effective solution to treat patchy zones on your scalp and beard regions. Make sure you use it regularly, but gently.
Q: Will it prick my scalp & skin?
A: Yes, the needles present on the roller will prick you a little, but it is a good prick that boosts hair growth. But do not forget to be gentle!
Q: How many times can I use it in a week?
A: The product is safe to use twice weekly.
Q: Will it harm my hair?
A: No, it won’t harm your hair. On the contrary, it helps deal with slower hair growth and patchiness.

Witness a cool and refreshing post-shaving experience.
As refreshing as the fresh ocean breeze. As calming as the Mediterranean Sea. The Man Company’s After Shave Spray is your ultimate post-shave solution with the goodness of Aloe Vera and Menthol. This intoxicating blend leaves your skin feeling cool and fresh after every shave and stirs your soul with its uplifting fragrance. Well, it does not just stop at this. The spray ensures a prolonged shave and reduces irritation caused by razor burns with its soothing touch.
How to use the After Shave Spray:


Step 1: After shaving, rinse off your face thoroughly and pat it dry


Step 2: Directly spray the After Shave on your face and neck


Step 3: Gently pat your skin to spread it evenly


Step 4: Witness the best post-shave skin


 
Quick Tip: For best results, use The Man Company’s Tea Tree & Vitamin E Shaving Cream to get a close and unmatched shave.



FAQs
Q: Will the After Shave Spray sting my skin?
A: No, the After Shave Spray will not sting your skin but will leave you with a cooling sensation.
Q: When can I use it?
A: We recommend using it every time you shave your face and neck.
Q: Will this make my razor burns worse?
A: No, our After Shave Spray has the goodness of Menthol & Aloe Vera that works as an antiseptic and helps calm and soothe razor burns, cuts and nicks.
Q: Can I use it if I have sensitive skin?
A: The After Shave Spray is suitable for all skin types. Even if you have sensitive skin, we have your shaving ritual covered. 
Q: Will it dry out my skin?
A: It will not dry out your skin. If anything, it will only hydrate it nicely with the goodness of Aloe Vera.
